main.name: Tapia-Téllez José Medardo
main.description: I'm a Computer Scientist with a keen interest in Data Science and Machine Learning
main.bio: I have a bachelors degree in Physics from Universidad Autonoma del Estado de Morelos and a masters in Computer Science from Instituto Nacional de Astrofísica Óptica y Electrónica. I have four years of experience in research labs where the last two were focused on data analysis and machine learning tasks. Among my great stregnths are solid mathematical foundations, experience with machine learning models, applied data science and extensive programming knowledge.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.school: Instituto Nacional de Astrofísica Óptica y Electrónica
education.description: Theoretical and practical preparation in relevant areas of Computer Science for scientific and technological development of the area. Special emphasis on Design and Analysis of Algorithms for Data Structures, Machine Learning and Applied Data Science for NLP

education.school: Universidad Autónoma del Estado de Morelos
education.description: Theoretical and practical preparation in relevant areas of Physics and Mathematics for scientific and technological development of the area. Special emphasis in Computational Numerical Methods and Cosmology.

work.title: Research Assistant
work.description: Data mining on text documents for quantitative evaluation and classification through Machine Learning models on the state-of-the-art.

work.company: High Energy Physics and Gravitation Laboratory at UNAM
work.title: Research Assistant
work.description: Analysis of inflationary and cosmological models through Mathematica.

work.company: Corrosión y Protección S.A. de C.V.
work.title: Stress Analyst
work.description: Analysis of stress generated by fluids on ducts of different shapes and materials. Recolection of duct-related soil samples for decision making on anti-corrosion and protective treatment.

publications.title: Comprehensibilityh Analysis and Assesment of Academic Texts
publications.description: This paper presents a computational-linguistic analysis, evaluation and feedback for academic documents based on three comprehensibility measures: Connectivity, Dispersion and Comprehensibility Burden.

publications.title: Data Augmentation with Transformers for Text Classification
publications.magazine: Mexican International Conference on Artificial Intelligence
publications.description: This paper explores the suitability of transformer models as a data augmentation mechanism for text classification. Four strategies are proposed and evaluated in benchmark data using CNN and LSTM based classifiers.

publications.title: General Bounds in Hybrid Natural Inflation
publications.magazine: Journal of Cosmology and Astroparticle Physics
publications.description: Great detail study of Hybrid Natural Inflation Model by constructing two simple effective field theories. The origin of the HNI potential can be traced to a symmetry breaking phenomenon occurring at some energy scale which gives rise to a massless Goldstone boson.

projects.title: Image Classification for SVHN Dataset
projects.category: Tensorflow construction of MLP and CNN networks to classify images for the SVHN dataset

projects.title: KdTree Analysis
projects.category: Object-Oriented KdTree implementation for analysis of running time and memory usage with Java.

projects.title: Data Cleansing and Analysis of Sports Data with Python
projects.category: The project reads and answer statistical questions about a file of metropolitan regions and associated sports team.

projects.title: Data Augmentation with Transformers
projects.category: A look into augmentating textual datsets based on attention mechanisms.

projects.title: Airport BigData Retrieval
projects.category: Retrieval from a BigData airports dataset with Impala (SQL) for recommendations.

projects.title: Hospitalizations due to SARS-COV2 Analysis
projects.category: Independent data visualization analysis of hospitalizations vs positive cases of SARS-COV2 in Mexico City.

projects.title: Legibility Rankers
projects.category: NLP and ML built rankers for identifying between two texts, which one of them is more legible.

projects.title: 8Puzzle
projects.category: 8puzzle object-oriented implementation with A* search algorithm for optimization.
